translation.src: </s> In many of the minority works of modern literature , there can be some emphasis on rebellion against oppressive forces .
translation.tgt: In many of the minority works of modern literature , there can be some emphasis on rebellion against oppressive forces .

translation.src: </s> Although such a show of strength by these works ' characters is sometimes viewed as a violent and therefore negative contribution to the otherwise insightful thought of the author , it is this conflict upon which many stories of ethnic American literature are based .
translation.tgt: Although such a show of strength by these works ' characters is sometimes viewed as a violent and therefore negative contribution to the otherwise insightful thought of the author , it is this conflict upon which many stories of ethnic American literature are based .

translation.src: <extra_id_0> R: catagorized </s> However , such a rebellion can not be seen clearly in each minority work , and , therefore , the products of ethnic American literature can not be <extra_id_0> as merely the result of years of oppression .
translation.tgt: However , such a rebellion can not be seen clearly in each minority work , and , therefore , the products of ethnic American literature can not be catagorized as merely the result of years of oppression .

translation.src: </s> Rather , this ever - changing and ever - challenging aspect of minority literature creates an especially important necessity that each work be considered individually as both a product of years of struggle and a work inherently distinct from any other .
translation.tgt: Rather , this ever - changing and ever - challenging aspect of minority literature creates an especially important necessity that each work be considered individually as both a product of years of struggle and a work inherently distinct from any other .

translation.src: </s> In the minority works , the conflict and rebellion presented accurately reflects society as a whole , and although the mother 's in The Joy Luck Club rebel against such forces as arranged marriages , Tita in Like Water for Chocolate fights to overcome old family traditions , and the Indian tribes in Love Medicine struggle to secure their inherent rights from the US government , the characters ' conflicts reflect similar conflicts of other cultures .
translation.tgt: In the minority works , the conflict and rebellion presented accurately reflects society as a whole , and although the mother 's in The Joy Luck Club rebel against such forces as arranged marriages , Tita in Like Water for Chocolate fights to overcome old family traditions , and the Indian tribes in Love Medicine struggle to secure their inherent rights from the US government , the characters ' conflicts reflect similar conflicts of other cultures .

translation.tgt: Rebellion is seen not as a distinct force in minority cultures , but rather as a binding force between all cultures , for Celie , too , resists her arranged marriage in The Color Purple , and the murderous loves in Jazz reflect Tita and Pedro 's destructive passion in Like Water for Chocolate .

translation.src: </s> Rebellion and conflict are emphasized in ethnic American literature , but they are portrayed no more strongly in minority works than they are portrayed in other pieces of literature .
translation.tgt: Rebellion and conflict are emphasized in ethnic American literature , but they are portrayed no more strongly in minority works than they are portrayed in other pieces of literature .

translation.tgt: Emphasis changes with each work , and although figures of authority are particullary oppressive in works such as Like Water for Chocolate and The Color Purple , other minority works including Love Medicine and Jazz do not reflect the clearly defined authoritarian figures nor the obvious rebellion of the characters ' responsive action which the previously mentioned works show .

translation.src: </s> It would be tempting to think of the various European Communities as an embryonic United States of Europe ; especially when we hear politicians talk of the importance of European Unity .

translation.tgt: They were prepared to yield as much of their own sovereignty as would be essential to allow the newly formed national government to operate as a single international political force .

translation.src: </s> A balance was therefore struck in the constitution to allow the individual states as much self - government as possible while ensuring that , for example in military matters , the central government spoke for all .

translation.src: </s> Ethnic American literature benefits U.S. citizens in many ways .

translation.src: </s> Violence on television can be seen throughout the many channels that cable has to offer .

translation.src: </s> With an average national TV viewing time of 7 1/4 hours daily , the prevalence of violence in broadcasts is a serious concern .

translation.src: </s> Television programming in the United States is considered the most violent in advanced industrialized nations ( Hepburn 1 ) .

translation.src: </s> Television violence is prevalent in the United States and some people disagree with its effects on children .

translation.src: </s> The V - chip is an electrical device that blocks out violent television shows .

translation.src: </s> Some people , such as the Senate Commerce Committee , are not satisfied with it .

translation.src: </s> The Senate Commerce Committee approved bills creating a partial ban on TV violence and a so - called report card that would identify stations carrying violent programming and the advertisers sponsoring it .

translation.src: </s> The bills would apply to broadcasting and cable ( Stern 1 ) .
translation.tgt: The bills would apply to broadcasting and cable ( Stern 1 ) .

translation.src: </s> Some of the proposals to antiviolence are as follows : the Senate V - chip , the House V - chip , a Technology Fund , a Violence Safe Harbor , and a Violence Report Card .

translation.src: </s> These proposals could work if Congress had some support .

translation.src: </s> The National Association of Broadcasters accused the Senate of " piling on a stream of proposals to build up an unprecedented federal censorship bureaucracy " .

translation.src: </s> The NAB also insisted that broadcasters already have responded to concerns over violence on television ( Stern 1 ) .
